title: graphhighlight
text: Generate random graph.
code: library(ggraph) library(igraph) library(graphhighlight)  set.seed(1) g <- random.graph.game(10,0.1,directed=TRUE) E(g)$weight <- sample(1:10, length(E(g)), replace=TRUE) V(g)$size <- sample(1:10, length(V(g)), replace=TRUE) V(g)$name <- letters[1:length(V(g))]

title: graphhighlight
text: function highlights nodes specifying node_name filter specifying conditions including nodes string. highlight_color specified, node color changed.  highlighting shapes stacking layers. highlight_by_shape specifies highlighting shape used, specify_shape shape, specify_shape_size size, shape_color color shape.  making nodes glowing-look. argument glow set TRUE. highlight_color specified, raw colors nodes used. highlight_color specified glow_fixed_color TRUE, color used.  glow_size controls big glowing . glow_base_size use base node size glowing. Otherwise parameters used stacking layers.  glowing function implemented highlighting edges highlight_edge, highlight_node_text text, shadowtext Prof.Â Guangchuang Yu implmented geom_node_text geom_text_repel can highlight text much better. highlight_node highlight_edge accept various filter functions ggfx, can specified use_ggfx ggfx_params parameters.  , using geom_textpath geomtextpath package, text annotation can added nodes.
code: ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size))+   highlight_node(filter="size>7",                  highlight_color="red")+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size))+   highlight_node(filter="size>7",                  highlight_by_shape = TRUE,                  shape_number = 21,                  shape_size = 21,                  shape_color="red")+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size, color=size))+   scale_color_viridis()+   highlight_node(filter="size>7",glow=TRUE)+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size, color=size))+   scale_color_viridis()+   highlight_node(filter="size>7",glow=TRUE,                  highlight_color="tomato",                  glow_fixed_color=TRUE)+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size, color=size))+   scale_color_viridis()+   highlight_node(filter="size<7",glow=TRUE,                  glow_size=5,                  glow_base_size = TRUE)+   theme_graph() library(ggfx) ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size, color=size))+   scale_color_viridis()+   highlight_node(filter="size<7",                  use_ggfx="with_outer_glow",                  ggfx_params=list(color="red"))+   theme_graph() library(geomtextpath) ggraph(g, layout="kk")+   geom_edge_link()+   geom_node_point(aes(size=size, color=size))+   scale_color_viridis()+   highlight_node(filter="size>7",                  highlight_by_shape = TRUE,                  shape_with_text = "this node is interesting",                  shape_size = 21,                  textpath_params=list(size=3,                   text_only=TRUE,                   offset=unit(5,"mm"),                   bg.colour="grey"))+   coord_fixed()+   theme_graph()

title: graphhighlight
text: Edges can highlighted way highlight_node.  can performed geoms.  arrows.  Glowing function can applied specifying glow TRUE. geom_edge_size controls big glowing . Note specifying big number deteriorate looking.  Coloring edge labels controlled change_label_color.
code: ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_edge_diagonal(aes(width=weight,                          color=weight))+   scale_edge_color_gradient(low="blue",high="red")+   highlight_edge(filter="weight>7",                  highlight_color="pink")+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_edge_bend2(aes(width=weight,                          color=weight))+   scale_edge_color_gradient(low="blue",high="red")+   highlight_edge(filter="weight>7",                  highlight_color="pink")+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_edge_link(aes(width=weight),               arrow = arrow(length = unit(4, 'mm')),                end_cap = circle(5, 'mm'),               start_cap = circle(5, "mm"))+   highlight_edge(filter="weight<5",                  highlight_color="steelblue")+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_edge_link(aes(width=weight),               arrow = arrow(length = unit(4, 'mm')),                end_cap = circle(5, 'mm'),               start_cap = circle(5, "mm"))+   highlight_edge(filter="weight<5",                  glow=TRUE,                  highlight_color="steelblue",                  glow_edge_size =0.5,                  glow_fixed_color = TRUE,                  glow_base_size =TRUE )+   theme_graph() ggraph(g, layout="nicely")+   geom_edge_link(aes(width=weight,                      label=weight),               angle_calc="along",               label_dodge = unit(5, 'mm'),               position="identity",               arrow = arrow(length = unit(4, 'mm')),                end_cap = circle(5, 'mm'),               start_cap = circle(5, "mm"))+   highlight_edge(filter="weight>5",                  change_label_color=TRUE,                  highlight_color="red")+   theme_graph()
